title: Andrea Cappozzo
text:
About me

I am an Associate Professor of Statistics at the Department of Statistical Sciences of Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore. I am currently based in Milan, Italy. My research focuses on applied statistics and statistical learning, with a particular emphasis on mixture modeling.


Research interests





Mixture models
Model-based clustering and classification
Robust statistics




Penalized estimation
Variable selection
Health Analytics
